/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, teeming with life, is lined with a variety of buildings and cars, creating a vibrant tableau of urban life. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, adding a serene backdrop to the busy street below. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, reflecting the natural and man-made elements of the scene. The perspective of the image, looking down on the street, gives a sense of scale and depth, making the viewer feel as if they are standing at the edge of the frame, looking down at the city below.
